page.title: 12THINGS TO DO
page.content: In Forest Town we have a lot of sports fields to play all kinds of sport. There are tennis courts, football fields, cricket fields, bowling greens and fishing areas. We have three tennis courts. We do not have a swimming pool in Forest Town because it is only a small village. In the village there is a youth club which is open four days a week. We also have a small library where people can come and go. St. Albans Church is the local parish church and it is there that we have winter discos in the evenings at weekends. The church also runs clubs like Cubs, Brownies, Scouts and Guides. We are fortunate to have a park where all the children can go and play on the swings and roundabouts that are there. {MARK CAWAR
